[quest]Magnetic Drive Pressure Former[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aExtruder§r | §aBending Machine§r | §aForming Press§r | §aForge Hammer§r

§6Extruder Mode: §c700%§r faster than singleblock of same voltage | Infinity Coil + enables §9Perfect Overclock§r

§6Bending, Forming Press, Forge Hammer modes: §c1500%§r faster than singleblock of same voltage | has §9Perfect Overclock§r

§c1024x§r Parallel

Extra §c100%§r speed multiplier per Coil Tier

[note]Needs Infinity Glass to use Laser Energy Hatch[/note]

[note]Use a §aScrewdriver§r to switch between modes[/note]

------------------------------------

The Magnetic Drive Pressure Former is a §915x25x15§r Cylinder-shaped Multiblock used as a direct upgrade for 4 different Multiblocks: Extruder, Bending Machine, Forming Press and Forge Hammer. 

You’ll need:

§c384§r Mining Osmiridium Casing
§c540§e§r Tiered Borosilicate Glass
§c504§r Advanced Iridium Plated Machine Casing
§c384§r Ameliorated Superconduct Coil
§c64§r Tiered Coils
§c90§r Assembly Line Casing
I/O hatch and Energy Hatches

§dPortion written by Annie Penndragon
